features: EXCELLENT INSULATION: Thanks to upgrade liner and technology Keeps your food cold /warm /fresh up to 14 hours, is longer than average lunch bags. You can enjoy perfect tasting meal wherever you are. actually it's a good outdoors-companion.

SUPERIOR SIDE MULTI-POCKETS: Unique KIPBELIF insulated lunch bag comes with multifunctional pockets on all sides. Serviette paper pocket, bottle pocket, Knife and fork pocket, and a large pocket for your daily items, such as phone, wallet, card and cash. One bag for all your stuffs.

LARGER CAPACITY: We KIPBELIF lunch bags provide normal size and extra larged size. The normal size can hold 14 cans of cola, and the larger size can hold 18 cans of cola. No matter what the size is, it can hold MORE than lunch bags of other brands. (Please see the picture for the size).

PRAISED STYLE: Thanks to our excellent designer KIPBELIF, in order to design a stylish lunch bag, they have spent more time than anyone paying attention to the latest popular elements. Popular feminine styles and colors have got many praise from users.

DURABLE / EASY-CLEAN: Thanks to the upgraded high-quality materials, after 200,000 tests, our lunch bags can bear 22lb for 5000 times. If your sauce or soup spills inside, just a wipe with damp cloth and it’s good as new. We KIPBELIF shop offer premium service for you anytime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful Lunch Bag
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful lunch bag. My wife loves how well it keeps her food cold (when there is an ice pak or two in it) almost all day. It's stylish, but very functional. It holds a lot for three meals worth of food. Spills clean up easily and it seems to be a durable product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great lunch box
reviews.reviewText: this is a really cute lunch box, lots of space and compartments and inside is insulated and nice. very chic and everyone thinks my lunch box is cute, good price and quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute, stylish, and functional!
reviews.reviewText: I love the style of this lunch bag! It’s so cute, and could totally be used as a purse with a small lunch. I like that the front and back pockets come out from the bag so you can actually put stuff in them without pushing into the interior space.I follow a whole food plant-based diet, so due to the low calorie density of plant foods, I take a lot of food with me to work and on picnics with my kids. For this reason, I’d like the bag to be a bit bigger, but most people don’t eat like me, so its size is probably perfect (or even with room to spare) for the average lunch packer.One of the pictures shows my daily smoothie in a 32 oz Nutri Ninja cup. The cup is a little taller than where the zipper is, but there is extra fabric built into the bag (the zipper level is a bit lower than the top of the bag), so I can still zip over the top of the smoothie cup. This also helps to stabilize the cup so it doesn’t fall over in a less than packed bag! However, even if it did fall over, and if it did happen to leak, the bag would still be fine because the inside is waterproof and insulated, so a quick wipe with a damp cloth, or even a rinse for a bigger spill, and it would be good as new! It would not leak through and stain the outside of the bag!The front pocket has a stylish clasp that is magnetized. The magnet is quite strong, so it closes with no effort. The back pocket closes with velcro.The straps are made of a flexible shiny fabric, and are attached with nice quality metal clasps, so the bag and straps move with ease and are not stiff or hard to manage.In summary, this bag is super cute and stylish! It smacks of high quality materials. I can’t wait for it to be available in more colors and patterns, and hopefully just a little bigger!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Durability and size
reviews.reviewText: I am enjoying the Pink Lunch bag. It has been very useful as I travel by car most days. It keeps my drinks and snacks cold and easily accessible. The size of the bag great.I am still on the fence with the strap and handles. I like the material of satin and elegant look. Curious on how the material will hold up with day to day use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plenty of outside pockets for easy storage and retrieval of non-food essentials
reviews.reviewText: Of all three the ladies' lunch bags I bought, this trumped all, because of the design and practicality.The shoulder strap is extremely handy and versatile. If you don't like shoulder strap, you can remove it and use the handles, but I like both of them.There are four outside pockets. The length-wise ones has two different closings: one has zipper which is great for wallet and phones, and the other has a magnetic button which is great for easy access. The side pockets has elastic band and are great to host your tumblers, sippy cups and cans.The interior has light color, similar to aluminum foil. This is great not only to appear clean, but also a great background color to reflect light and allow items to be easily identify (as opposed to the black interior.) The silverly interior als reflect the heat and cold back to the food and drink stored in the main compartment and maintain their desired temperature.I use this bag for road trip and always carry it into the gas station to refill my ice / water / hot water. I use it while performing outdoors to keep my cold drinks cold in the main compartment, and to put thermacell bug repellent gadget and my insulated tumbler on the side pocket.The bag appear quite small, but can accommodate a lot with its top zipper design. The shape stands well on the ground by itself. It does not collapse even when empty.The exterior has light water repelling fabric and is easy to clean. Same as the interior. It is upscale enough to carry to office for work, and versatile enough for outdoor endeavor such as outdoor concert, sports events, and impromptu picnic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this bag!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a lunch bag that would allow me to stack my bowls upright instead of them sitting in my bag sideways and leaking all over. This bag is so perfect! I debated on buying the normal size or the large size and went with the normal size. This bag is way bigger than a normal typical lunch bag. I'm not really sure why anyone would need the large size unless you plan on packing for 2+ meals. The entire inside is insulated- my food stays cold and if anything does leak (which since the bowls sit upright it doesn't happen) it's easy to clean up and does not leak through the bag. There is a side compartment on each side of the bag, which is a bit small, but perfect for condiments, granola bars, hot cocoa/tea bags, silverware. Both ends of the bag have compartments that can hold water bottles. Or in my case I use one side for a 24 ounce water bottle and the other side for my 24 ounce coffee mug. Both fit perfect and the material comes up high enough to hold them in place good. The handles are nice and strong and secured good. The bottom of the bag is slightly raised up with metal feet in each corner (so the bottom of your bag doesn't get dirty if you set it down). This is the absolute perfect lunch bag. And it's cute enough and functional enough to be used outside of being just a lunch bag too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So pleased with this purchase !
reviews.reviewText: First of all , I’ve had hit and misses when ordering on Amazon , but this insulated lunch bag is definitely a HIT ! One look, you can tell that it’s quality made and durable, both inside and out . I bought the standard size and it is roomy enough but not bulky looking . It has a strap that is removable and adjustable , how neat is that . I work 12 hr shift , and there’s plenty of room for food and drinks to last the whole shift . So happy that I picked this bag, highly recommend .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bag for lunch or whatever you carry daily
reviews.reviewText: So many of my coworkers have liked my bag so much that they have ordered themselves one. Great quality and it truly does hold a lot.

reviews.reviewTitle: Esta hermosa, es bastante amplia, 😍... definitivamente deben comprarla.
reviews.reviewText: Me gustó el espacio que tiene.El color muy bonito.El material excelente calidad.Envío rápido.Compra 100% recomendada.
En lo personal la califico con muy buena calidad de materiales ya que se sienten muy resistentes y de buena calidad, así como los compartimentos de fuera son amplios, para mí 10/10.
Very good quality and has lots of storage pockets too
